title: Calories in a Granny Smith Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in granny smith apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for one medium fruit.
h1: Calories in a Granny Smith Apple
assumptions: Medium size (~182 g with skin), raw, unpeeled; no added toppings or processing.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, growing conditions, and variety; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium Granny Smith apple provides ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for a medium-sized one.

faqs.q: Are Granny Smith apples low carb?
faqs.a: They have ~25 g carbs per medium apple, mostly natural sugars.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in a Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: Around 4.4 g per medium apple, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Do apples have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0.3 g) and 0 mg cholesterol per apple.

faqs.q: How does apple size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller apples have fewer calories (e.g., ~52 kcal for 100 g); larger ones more.
